document.full_text: the lede blog is tracking reaction to the release of more than 700 classified military documents that provide new and detailed accounts of the men who have done time at the guantanamo bay prison in cuba.
document.title: the lede: reaction to 'the guantanamo files'
lines_and_colors: the lede blog is tracking reaction to the release of more than 700 classified military documents that provide new and detailed accounts of the men who have done time at the guantanamo bay prison in cuba.
